com.tinkerpop.rexster.config

Interface GraphConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSailGraphConfiguration, DexGraphConfiguration, MemoryStoreSailGraphConfiguration, NativeStoreSailGraphConfiguration, Neo4jGraphConfiguration, OrientGraphConfiguration, RexsterGraphGraphConfiguration, SparqlRepositorySailGraphConfiguration, TinkerGraphGraphConfiguration

    public interface GraphConfiguration
    The GraphConfiguration interface is used to take a Configuration object from rexster.xml and from that generate a new Graph instance.

    This interface can be used to construct new Graph configuration types for Rexster for other Blueprints implementations not yet supported by Rexster (i.e. Infinite Graph).

    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)
